data.title: Great late night burgers
data.text: Burgers here were pretty good. Personally, I prefer Al's, but Buns is open super late and are a great option for that. Lots of options for building your own burger, and prices were reasonable.

data.title: Yum!
data.text:
We met my son & his girlfriend here for lunch and ordered 3 different types of burgers, a large order of fries and a caesar salad. I wasn't very hungry before we ordered, so I offered to cut my burger in half & give the other half to my son for later. I regretted that once I started eating my fire-roasted jalapeno burger with avocado & bacon! I made good on my promise, by eating a few too many fries! You can get a mixed order of regular and sweet potato fries, which was great. My son got a milkshake which he thoroughly enjoyed too.
It's a casual, order-first-then-pick-a-table type of place, which you would expect near a university.

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: Food was good and service was great! Not too crowded when we went but the restaurant had ample seating. Burgers made to order.

data.title: Everything is real and amazing
data.text: Everything is housemade, from the buns, to the veggie patties, to the house-cut fries, to the dipping sauces. There is no finer veggie burger available! I don't know how their meat burgers are, but their fries, endless dipping sauces, and incredible variety of toppings are top notch. I've been coming here for 5 years, and it's still one of our special treat restaurants! It's that good!

data.title: Very Veggie Burger!
data.text: My stomach is still smiling! I am very thankful for this handmade deliciousness. The sweet potato fries were a bit over cooked for my taste but I can't think of a thing to complain about. I HIGHLY recommend the Very Veggie Burger...seriously, I'd love the recipe.

data.title: Try the Salmon Sandwich
data.text: For a burger place I was happy to see a salmon sandwich. It was one of the best ones I've ever had and a great price! Their baskets of fries are huge, too! Good service and food 🙌🏽

data.title: Average Restaurant.
data.text: This is an okay place to eat.The food is good but not great.The staff are average.It has a nice atmosphere.

data.title: Doctor
data.text: We had to go down for our son's doctor appointment and we ate at Buns! The burgers are good and if you order fries they give you a mountain of fries! And we liked all the variety of dipping sauce! We will be back!

data.title: Bleh
data.text: Nothing special. Greasy food, mediocre burgers. I've had a lot better and would recommend just going elsewhere if you want a burger

data.title: Burgers and shakes
data.text: Huge variety of burgers that are worth the visit to this fast casual place. But the shakes are worthy of going out of your way a bit.

data.title: Your Burger in too many ways....
data.text:
Despite the rave reviews, we were not impressed.  This is an average burger, with a wide range of choices for toppings.  The fries were average too, nothing special.  Kipos has better fries!

Portions are large, which is one element behind its popularity, I suppose. 

Your order at the register, and need to quickly solve the combination of toppings you want, or else order one of the complex suggestions.  They have beer and a soda too.  Service brings the order to your table without too much of a wait.  

I suggest Sup Dogs has a more flavorful burger, and it is only about 150 feet away.

data.title: Best burger place!
data.text: The burger is delicious, and fries are amazing and served in a huge portion. The price is ok and the attendants are nice.

data.title: Fantastic Burger!
data.text: Buns is a small, family-owned burger place, featuring outstanding burgers made to order.  The menu is burger centric as you'd expect, but they also have some non-burger options if that's more to your liking.  The toppings are fresh and flavorful as are the burgers.  Highly recommended.  You can also order online to avoid a line during rush hours.

data.title: Best burger at UNC
data.text: We were touring the campus of UNC and this was recommended to us by a student.  Great place with a great location.

data.title: Pretty good
data.text: The ordering process is pretty fun and it's nice to be able to make your own burger however you like it, plus buns is open late enough that it makes for a fantastic food stop after a night out. It is a little expensive for burger/fries but the burgers are good and it does open late. I'd say it's probably not fantastic value for money but I keep going so something must be good about it! (It's the sweet potato fries).

data.title: Very good hamburgers and fries
data.text: Enjoyed trying the build your own burgers with all of the choices of toppings. The fries and the sweet potato fries were fantastic.

data.title: Great burgers, shakes, and staff
data.text: Went for a quick burger with my family. The staff were extremely welcoming, friendly, and helpful. The burgers and veggie burgers were tasty and the order of fries was huge and good. Shakes and malts were creamy and rich. Great value.

data.title: Bunz
data.text:
They've got buns, hun.

They also have enormous servings of french fries (sweet potato fries too!) I like their veggie burgers, they have different buns to choose from (pretzel, whole wheat etc) various dipping sauces.

Don't drive here, order from Tarheel Takeout or stop by after class/work, there's nowhere to park. Also you'll be hassled by a million panhandlers depending upon the direction you arrive from.

data.title: Late night!
data.text: The ultimate place for a late night burger! You can customize your burger entirely. Even if your favorite ingredient is not on the menu then ask for it anyway. They might have it.

data.title: Amazing Burgers!
data.text:
Simply put, "wow!"  Online ordering, amazing burgers and a great selection.  

This is not your everyday burger joint.  Looking for the best veggie burger around?  This is your place!  Looking for the best bacon, avocado artery blocker?  Have at it!  

This is a Burger Heaven!
